snippet: Adeiny Hechavarria had two hits and drove in a run during a decisive five-run rally in the eighth inning to help the Miami Marlins beat the Pittsburgh Pirates 6-3 on Tuesday night....

headline.print_headline: Marlins Use Big Eighth to Beat Pirates 6-3
headline.main: Marlins Use Big Eighth to Beat Pirates 6-3

lead_paragraph: Adeiny Hechavarria had two hits and drove in a run during a decisive five-run rally in the eighth inning to help the Miami Marlins beat the Pittsburgh Pirates 6-3 on Tuesday night.
